name: Find The Differences Detective
description:
There are 100 unique levels in this game and so it can entertain you for hours! 

There are also two tools at your disposal that can help you a lot. First one is your 

detective magnifier which will zoom in on the image so that you can examine it in more 

details and find the differences more easily. And the other one is hint that marks the area 

of one of the differences for you. Just note that you can’t use the hint to find all differences 

and if you don’t use it for some time and proceed without it, then it will change to a special hint! 

So, good luck detective!

Features:

100 levels

Magnifier tool

Hint feature

High quality images
